data.title: Juhi Chaturvedi: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Juhi Chaturvedi: Check out the list of all Juhi Chaturvedi movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Juhi Chaturvedi news on Times of India.
data.text:
Certain films bring money, certain films bring satisfaction: writer Juhi Chaturvedi

PTI / Feb 12, 2023, 18:19 (IST)

Commercial blockbusters and life-like stories need to coexist, says screenwriter Juhi Chaturvedi, who believes the record-breaking box office success of 'Pathaan' has reinstated audiences' as well as filmmakers' faith in theatres.

Juhi Chaturvedi on Amitabh Bachchan's 80th Birthday: He is like a hermit, he has denounced the world and there’s nothing else left other than his art - Exclusive

etimes.in / Oct 11, 2022, 12:02 (IST)

Writer Juhi Chaturvedi has worked with Amitabh Bachchan on some memorable movies like Piku, Gulabo Sitabo and even the unreleased Shoebite. On his 80th birthday, Juhi who's formed an acclaimed trio with Mr Bachchan and director Shoojit Sircar, recalls all that is special about the superstar.

Hansal Mehta to talk on OTT popularity at Dharamshala Film Festival

IANS / Oct 30, 2021, 13:01 (IST)

Noted director Hansal Mehta and screenwriter Juhi Chaturvedi are going to be part of a roundtable discussion moderated by director Raja Sen at the 10th edition of Dharamshala International Film Festival.

Actor Farrukh Jaffer of 'Gulabo Sitabo' fame passes away at 88 in Lucknow

TNN / Oct 17, 2021, 04:09 (IST)

Amitabh Bacchan’s ‘Begum’, Rekha’s mother in Umrao Jaan, ‘Badi Apa’ in Secret Superstar — veteran actress Farrukh Jaffer passed away on Friday here at the age of 88. Jaffer was not keeping well for some and breathed her last at a private hospital.

Do you know who wrote your favourite film?

Jul 24, 2021, 17:21 (IST)

Writers barely get the credit they deserve — a new book on women screenwriters in Bollywood illuminates a hazy corner of the glittering silver screen

66th Vimal Elaichi Filmfare Awards 2021: Complete list of winners

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Apr 11, 2021, 12:58 (IST)

The 66th Vimal Elaichi Filmfare Awards 2021 was a star-studded affair. Despite the pandemic and the subsequent lockdown, Bollywood continued to deliver films in 2020. The prestigious award function, that took place at Filmcity in Mumbai, awarded the best of Hindi cinema from the films released last year. Check out the complete winners' list of the 66th Vimal Elaichi Filmfare Awards 2021, that was hosted by Rajkummar Rao and Riteish Deshmukh

Amitabh Bachchan and Ayushmann Khurrana starrer 'Gulabo Sitabo' will now release on THIS date; deets inside

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Dec 16, 2019, 11:12 (IST)

There are a lot of reports doing rounds about Shoojit Sircar's much-awaited comedy-drama 'Gulabo Sitabo's' release date. As per the latest development, the makers of the film have now decided to release the film on 17th April 2020. The versatile actor Ayushmann Khurrana and the legendary star Amitabh Bachchan will be seen sharing the screen space for the first time in the film.

'The good part of our times is that a lot of people are finding their voice and are allowed that'

TNN / Nov 26, 2019, 01:00 (IST)

“I have come to the conclusion that women remain the same. We look at situations in a strikingly similar way even after so many years.”

Meghna Gulzar: I go through cycles of attachment and detachment while making a film

TNN / Nov 24, 2019, 17:03 (IST)

"I actually go through cycles of attachment and detachment with my world and the characters," said the filmmaker.

'Gulabo Sitabo': The makers of Ayushmann Khurrana and Amitabh Bachchan starrer prepone the film's release to THIS date

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Oct 30, 2019, 15:39 (IST)

Ayushmann Khurrana and Amitabh Bachchan will be seen sharing the screen space for the first time in the upcoming film 'Gulabo Sitabo'. The film is helmed by Shoojit Sircar and is written by Juhi Chaturvedi of 'Piku' fame. The team had recently wrapped up the shooting of the comedy family entertainer in Lucknow.
